ja500:4.1: kammāni karoti bālo → karonti bālā (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja500:4.2: Idhameva → idameva (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, Ma-aka); imameva (mr) | maññamāno → maññamānā (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja500:5.2: Na bandhuvā → na bandhavā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | na sarīravaṇṇo yo → na sarīrāvakāso (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja500:5.4: goravindaṁ → gorimandaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | hi naṁ → sirihīnaṁ (bj, mr); sirīhīnaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | na paññā → na paññaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja500:9.4: iddhiṁ paññopi loke → iddhiparo hi loke (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); iddhiparo hi loko (pts-vp-pli1)
